org.apache.commons.math4.fitting.leastsquares

Class StatisticalReferenceDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.math4.fitting.leastsquares.StatisticalReferenceDataset

  • public abstract class StatisticalReferenceDataset
extends java.lang.Object
    This class gives access to the statistical reference datasets provided by the NIST (available here). Instances of this class can be created by invocation of the StatisticalReferenceDatasetFactory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatisticalReferenceDataset(java.io.BufferedReader in)
      Creates a new instance of this class from the specified data file.

      Returns the least-squares problem corresponding to fitting the model to the specified data.
      abstract double[] getModelDerivatives(double x, double[] a)
      Returns the values of the partial derivatives of the model with respect to the parameters.

      Returns the value of the model for the specified values of the predictor variable and the parameters.

      • StatisticalReferenceDataset

        public StatisticalReferenceDataset(java.io.BufferedReader in)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new instance of this class from the specified data file. The file must follow the StRD format.
        Parameters:
        in - the data file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getData

        public double[][] getData()
        Returns a copy of the data arrays. The data is laid out as follows
      • data[0][i] = x[i],
      • data[1][i] = y[i],
Returns:
the array of data points.
